duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership and management for the culinary department by establishing efficient systems and processes to ensure standards as set forth by Four Seasons and culinary partners are adhered to.
Assist in the planning and development of recipes and ensure the correct preparation and presentation of a consistent level for all food items through production and demonstration.
Maintain control systems to assure quality and portion consistency, monitor food shipments to meet purchasing specifications, and foster awareness of the importance of food preparation and quality.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Culinary Arts or related field (Master's preferred)
